DzSimpleElementData Class Reference
[Basic Types]

DzCustomData implementation that can be associated with an individual DzElement instance. More...

#include <dzcustomdata.h>

DzSettings * getSettings ()

Detailed Description

DzCustomData implementation that can be associated with an individual DzElement instance.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzSimpleElementData::DzSimpleElementData ( const QString &  name,
bool  persistent = false 
)

Default constructor.

Parameters:
name The name for the data item. This must be unique for all data items on a given element - i.e. an element can not have two data items with the same name.
persistent If true, the data item will be saved with the element to the native file format.
DzSimpleElementData::~DzSimpleElementData (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

DzSettings * DzSimpleElementData::getSettings (  )  [inline, slot]
Returns:
A pointer to the settings owned by this element data item.
const DzSettings * DzSimpleElementData::getSettings (  )  const [inline]
Returns:
A const pointer to the settings owned by this element data item.
void DzSimpleElementData::loadSection ( DzInFile *  file,
short  sectionID 
) [virtual]

Note: Save of .daz is deprecated in favor of duf/dsf. Developers are encouraged to support backwards compatibility, but new functionality need not support .daz.

Called by the framework to allow this object to load data for the given section. Derived classes override this method to read section data from the native file format.

Parameters:
file The file to read from
sectionID The section ID of the section to read.

Reimplemented from DzBase.

void DzSimpleElementData::save ( DzOutFile *  file  )  const [virtual]

Virtual funtion that is called to allow this object to save itself to the deprecated .daz file format.

Deprecated:
.daz file format is deprecated, please use df/dsf format for saving. See the projects under the saving folder for examples.
Parameters:
file The file to write the data to.

Reimplemented from DzBase.
